Objective

I am seeking a remote full-time position as a Front End Web Developer. I have a broad and diverse skillset, along with an adept ability to quickly adopt and apply new technologies as the industry demands.

Experience

DigitasLBi

Chicago, IL
2007 - October 2017
Senior Creative Engineer (remote)
  • Designed, developed, and maintained innovative, engaging, and informative websites for a global audience.
  • Advised, collaborated with, and synthesized feedback from Marketing and Technology clients, and Creative and Analytics teams.
  • Challenged established thinking, and discovered new ways of approaching (and solving) issues.
  • Collaborated with and mentored junior front end engineers.
  • Adopted new technologies and standards to provide the best solutions to our clients.
  • Worked on large enterprise projects that spanned multiple countries.
  • Successfully executed on the demands and responsibilities of this remote position due to a high level of self-discipline, organizational skills, and collaboration with others.
  • Notable clients included MillerCoors, John Deere, Whirlpool, Playstation, Bank of America, and BP.
